description:
A social deduction game where players are at a specific location, but one player is a Spy who doesn't know where they are. GAME STRUCTURE: One Spy, multiple Non-Spies. WIN CONDITIONS: Non-Spies win by identifying the Spy. The Spy wins by guessing the location or avoiding detection. PHASES: (1) Questioning: Players take turns asking questions to each other to prove they know the location without giving it away to the Spy. (2) Voting: Players vote to eliminate the suspected Spy. STRATEGY: Non-Spies must be subtle; Spies must listen and blend in. 

 The players in this game are: {agent_names}.

role_goals.Non-Spy: Identify the Spy without revealing the location too clearly.
role_goals.Spy: Figure out the location and blend in as a Non-Spy.

role_secrets.Spy: You are the Spy. You do NOT know the location.

end_conditions.message: [Game] The Spy has been caught! Non-Spies win.
[Game] The Spy has evaded capture! Spy wins.
